    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:B202_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>B202_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">The concept of innovation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Konzept der Innovation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le concept de l'innovation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conceito da inovação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il concetto di innovazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έννοια της καινοτομίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El concepto de la innovación</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Just what is innovation? This unit examines the issues surrounding the concept of innovation. What is the difference between innovation and invention? How are organisations affected by innovation: are all of the outcomes positive? You will learn how to analyse this concept and its impact on resources, capabilities and competencies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Business and Management</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Benefit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Innovation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Invention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Organisations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Product</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerade was ist Innovation? Diese 
Maßeinheit überprüft die Ausgaben, die das Konzept der Innovation 
umgeben. Was ist der Unterschied zwischen Innovation und 
Erfindung? Wie die Organisationen sind, die durch Innovation 
beeinflußt werden: sind alle Resultate positiv? Sie 
erlernen, wie man dieses Konzept und seine Auswirkung auf 
Betriebsmittel, Fähigkeiten und Kompetenzen analysiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au juste quelle est innovation ? Cette 
unité examine les issues entourant le concept de l'innovation. 
Quelle est la différence entre l'innovation et l'invention ? 
Vont comment les organismes affectés par l'innovation : 
est-ce que tous les résultats sont positifs ? Vous 
apprendrez comment analyser ce concept et son impact sur des 
ressources, des capacités et des compétences.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apenas que é inovação? Esta unidade 
examina as edições que cercam o conceito da inovação. Que é
a diferença entre a inovação e a invenção? Como são as 
organizações afetadas pela inovação: são todos os 
resultados positivos? Você aprenderá como analisar este 
conceito e seu impacto em recursos, em potencialidades e em 
competencies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appena che cosa è innovazione? Questa 
unità esamina le edizioni che circondano il concetto di innovazione. 
Che cosa è la differenza fra innovazione e l'invenzione? 
Come sono le organizzazioni influenzate da innovazione: 
sono tutti i risultati positivi? Imparerete come 
analizzare questo concetto ed il relativo effetto sulle risorse, sulle
possibilità e sulle competenze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακριβώς τι είναι καινοτομία; Αυτή η μονάδα 
εξετάζει τα ζητήματα που περιβάλλουν την έννοια της καινοτομίας. 
Ποια είναι η διαφορά μεταξύ της καινοτομίας και της 
εφεύρεσης; Πώς είναι οργανώσεις που επηρεάζονται από την 
καινοτομία: είναι όλες οι εκβάσεις θετικές; Θα 
μάθετε πώς να αναλύσετε αυτήν την έννοια και τον αντίκτυπό της 
στα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς, τις ικανότητες και τις ικανότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Apenas cuál es innovación? Esta unidad 
examina las ediciones que rodean el concepto de la innovación. 
¿Cuál es la diferencia entre la innovación y la invención? 
Cómo son las organizaciones afectadas por la innovación: 
¿son todos los resultados positivos? Usted aprenderá 
cómo analizar este concepto y su impacto en recursos, capacidades y 
capacidades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
